parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run, without performing the actual request. Valid values:

*   **true**: performs only a dry run. The system checks the request for potential issues, including missing parameter values, incorrect request syntax, and service limits. If the request fails the dry run, an error code is returned. If the request passes the dry run, the `DryRunOperation` error code is returned.
*   **false** (default): performs a dry run and performs the actual request. If the request passes the dry run, a 2xx HTTP status code is returned and the operation is performed.

parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the new resource group. For more information about resource groups, see the "Resource Group" section of the [What is Resource Management?](~~94475~~) topic.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to EXPRESSCONNECTROUTER.
